name: Duat
description:
Duat is an action-rpg-roguelike video game in which you will explore the ancient Egypt underworld as Radamesh, a soldier on their way to eternal life.

Defeat the fearsome mummies and get powerful special attacks like the fireball or the tornado, etc.
